title: Live Debugging Node.js With Docker
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use Docker and Visual Studio Code to develop and debug a Node.js application without having Node.js installed locally.

meta.title: Live Debugging Node.js With Docker
meta.description: Discover how to debug Node.js applications using Docker and Visual Studio Code, without the need for a local Node.js installation.
meta.keywords: linux lab, linux practice exercises, online kali linux terminal, visual studio code, practice linux commands online, debugging, linux practice online, docker command line, docker playground, linux labs
